en-US.BOT_GUILD_JOIN: `{}` | Hi `{}`! Use `{}help` to get more information on what I can do. Use `{}locale` to change the locale.
en-US.MENTION_HELP: Hello! Use `{}help` to get more information on what I can do. Did you know I can play Marco Polo?
en-US.MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Sorry {}, you don't have the permissions required to use this command.
en-US.PURGE_INVALID_ARGUMENT: Please provide an amount of messages to delete or use `-a` to purge the channel.
en-US.COUNT_INVALID_ARGUMENT: Please provide a message ID to stop counting when reached or use `-a` to count all messages.
en-US.COUNT_BE_PATIENT: Please be patient, this might take some time.
en-US.COUNT_FOUND_REPLY: I've found {} messages up to this message.
en-US.LOCALE_REQUIRE: Please provide a valid locale. Available locales: {}
en-US.KICK_INVALID_ARGUMENT: Please provide one or more guild members. Optionally, also provide a reason.
en-US.KICK_MESSAGE_PRIVATE: You have been kicked from `{}`. Reason: `{}`.
en-US.BAN_INVALID_ARGUMENT: Please provide one or more guild members. Optionally, also provide a reason.
en-US.BAN_MESSAGE_PRIVATE: You have been banned from `{}`. Reason: `{}`.
en-US.COPYPASTA_NONE_FOUND_ID: No copypasta with ID {} was found in `{}`.
en-US.COPYPASTA_NONE_FOUND_QUERY: No copypasta matching the query '{}' was found in `{}`.
en-US.COPYPASTA_NONE_FOUND_TITLE: No copypasta with '{}' in its title was found in `{}`.
en-US.COPYPASTA_ONE_FOUND_QUERY: I have only found one copypasta when searching for '{}':
en-US.COPYPASTA_MULTIPLE_FOUND_TITLE: I have found {} copypastas with '{}' in their title:
en-US.COPYPASTA_ALREADY_EXISTS_ADD: It looks like this copypasta has already been added!
en-US.COPYPASTA_SET_CHANNEL: Done! All messages sent to {} will be automatically saved as copypastas.
en-US.COPYPASTA_SET_CHANNEL_NONE: Done! No channel will have its messages automatically saved as copypastas.
en-US.COPYPASTA_SET_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: No text channel named '{}' was found in `{}`.
en-US.COPYPASTA_INVALID_USAGE: Invalid usage. Use `{}help copypasta` to get help on how to use this command.
en-US.LOGGING_MESSAGE_DELETED_FIELD_HEADER_VAL: A message sent to {} by {} was deleted!
A message sent to {} was deleted! Unfortunately, it was not cached, so I could not find its author or contents.
en-US.LOGGING_SET_CHANNEL: Done! Deleted messages will be logged in {}.
en-US.LOGGING_SET_CHANNEL_NONE: Done! No channel will be used for logging deleted messages.
en-US.LOGGING_SET_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: No text channel named '{}' was found in `{}`.

pt-BR.BAN_INVALID_ARGUMENT: Por favor forneça um ou mais membros da guilda. Opcionalmente, forneça também um motivo.
